Back To Recipes

recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

water 12 thousand second counts
coffee grounds 5 scoop
collagen powder 1 scoop
coffee 2 inches
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 13 Minutes

Recipe:

Add 12 thousand second countss water to the sauce pan
Turn stove to "HIGH" (after 9) and wait for whistle (Takes 8.5 minutes)
Put 5 scoops coffee grounds into french press bag
Put french press bag into french press
Once sauce pan whistles - pour water into french press until water level reaches silver chrome part
Put top onto french press (Takes 4 minutes)
Push french press top down
Add the following to a coffee cup
> 1 scoop collagen powder
> 2 inchess coffee
Stir coffee cup
If iced coffee - Fill cup with ice
Pour coffee into cup, 1 inch from top
Top off with creamer and stir
